Text: RE ECC Riskmantra counterparties Cc PST Dawn At this stage I havent heard any indications we wouldnt continue to operate this way One important thing here is that this leg logic was never applied to the US counterparties we deal with so we end up having to book a second leg on any deals we do with a Houston counterparty in EOL Since this was obviously considered to be worth doing for the US I dont see why we wouldnt do it for Canada too it would be a significant time saver Brian Original Message From Kenne Dawn C Sent Thursday January PM To Keiser Kam Gillis Brian Reeves Kathy Cc Lozano Melba Sweitzer Tara Denny Jennifer Meredith Kevin Subject ECC Riskmantra counterparties Kam Kathy and Brian Concerning the ECC Riskmantra logic that EOL has in place to convert the transactions that are done with counterparties with ECC master agreementsare we going to continue this way of booking legs If so can you review the list of counterparties that follows the leg logic and let me know if there need to be any additions or deletions Thanks Dawn File ECC counterpartiesxls
All CGPR exposure Dec that the file has been updated for the th of December as well as corrected for an error in the physical volume pickup
All CGPR exposure Dec that the file has been updated for the th of December as well as corrected for an error in the physical volume pickup
Here is a sample of the spreadsheetPST Note that you must also get Wei Hu to set it up so that it will accept the spreadsheet he will need a name that you will use an example is CANDEDxls

Sithe deals Cc PST Phillip Im still running the Canadian minibook on these deals but here is the list of the deals that were created Old deal New deal NH VC E VC E VC E VC EA VC QA VC Any Houston book in these deals with the exception of TPCanada was changed to the SITHEUNWIND book The FTCANDEGSC was changed to SITHEUNWINDCAD Ill be in touch with you shortly on this
